title: Query Retrieve View
description: Specifies behavior on Rejection Note Stored

dcmShowInstancesRejectedByCode.title: Show Instances Rejected By Code
dcmShowInstancesRejectedByCode.description: Indicates if the Q/R Services shall show instances rejected by the specified code in format (CV, CSD, 'CM'')

dcmHideRejectionNoteWithCode.title: Hide Rejection Note With Code
dcmHideRejectionNoteWithCode.description: Indicates if the Q/R Services shall hide Rejection Notes with the specified code in format (CV, CSD, 'CM'')

dcmHideNotRejectedInstances.title: Hide Not Rejected Instances
dcmHideNotRejectedInstances.description: Indicates if the Q/R Services shall hide instances not rejected by any reason.
